entry.title: Monday night: Showers or drizzle. Low 7.
entry.summary: Showers or drizzle. Fog patches developing this evening. Amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this evening. Low 7. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Monday 1 May 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. High 12. POP 60%
entry.summary: Showers ending in the morning then mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. High 12. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Monday 1 May 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers in the evening then 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light overnight. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Monday 1 May 2023
